document.full_text: nigerian president goodluck jonathan said on thursday the final round of elections would go ahead next week despite rioting which has killed at least 120 people across the mostly muslim north.
document.title: nigeria leader says polls to continue despite riots
lines_and_colors: nigerian president goodluck jonathan said on thursday the final round of elections would go ahead next week despite rioting which has killed at least 120 people across the mostly muslim north.
